title: >>> For MERCY
body_text:
The glitz, the glamour, the game that was DODGEBALL CX ... what did you think?
A ... Now that's dodgeball.
B ... I liked it.
C ... Not bad, but still a little disappointed.
D ... Barely passed.
E ... Ouch.
________________________________________
________________________
Titans in their tender teenage years begging, pleading, craving for this test of endurance, power, and revenge ...
Kevin Adams
vs.
Grant Cornero
, Part Deuce.
The "Kevin Adams List of Victims" is well-documented: Tronolone, Letsche, DeCuir, Herrera, and that's only a handful! For the artful veteran, a match of this magnitude if he can pull it off, will undoubtedly cement his name in the history books as the first 8 time battle victor.
For the rookie-of-the-year candidate Cornero, his sophomore contest will be an opportunity to do what he failed to accomplish at
DODGEBALL LXXXVI
. If he can knock-off his legendary couterpart, the athletically-blessed 18 year-old sensation will emerge as only the third competitor in history to do so.
It's one of the most eagerly anticipated return bouts in recent memory, bound to jump start this extraordinary 12th Season into a new era.
Titans in their tender teenage years begging, pleading, craving for this test of endurance, power, and revenge - and by the end of CX1, one may just be
begging for mercy
.
body_html:
The glitz, the glamour, the game that was DODGEBALL CX ... what did you think?
  


________________________________________________________________


Titans in their tender teenage years begging, pleading, craving for this test of endurance, power, and revenge ...

Kevin Adams vs. Grant Cornero, Part Deuce.

The "Kevin Adams List of Victims" is well-documented: Tronolone, Letsche, DeCuir, Herrera, and that's only a handful! For the artful veteran, a match of this magnitude if he can pull it off, will undoubtedly cement his name in the history books as the first 8 time battle victor.

For the rookie-of-the-year candidate Cornero, his sophomore contest will be an opportunity to do what he failed to accomplish at DODGEBALL LXXXVI. If he can knock-off his legendary couterpart, the athletically-blessed 18 year-old sensation will emerge as only the third competitor in history to do so.

It's one of the most eagerly anticipated return bouts in recent memory, bound to jump start this extraordinary 12th Season into a new era.


Titans in their tender teenage years begging, pleading, craving for this test of endurance, power, and revenge - and by the end of CX1, one may just be begging for mercy.
